questions.question_text: "mitigate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make something less severe or harmful
questions.example_sentence: The company introduced new procedures to mitigate operational risks.
questions.explanation:
緩和する・軽減する
事業拡大
決算公開
方針承認

questions.question_text: "assessment" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of evaluating or analyzing something
questions.example_sentence: Risk assessments must be conducted annually to identify potential issues.
questions.explanation:
評価・査定
システム障害
提案
契約

questions.question_text: "framework" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A structured system that outlines processes or guidelines
questions.example_sentence: The new framework provides clear procedures for managing emergencies.
questions.explanation:
枠組み・フレームワーク
倉庫
保険
管理職

questions.question_text: "protocol" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: An official procedure or set of rules
questions.example_sentence: Emergency response protocols were updated to ensure employee safety.
questions.explanation:
手順・規定
メンテナンス予定
予測モデル
コミュニケーションツール

questions.question_text: "comprehensive" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: The framework offers a comprehensive review of potential risks across all departments.
questions.explanation:
包括的な・広範囲の
短時間で完了
専門家限定
財務関連のみ
